value:
$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|I finally caught up to you two!
What have you been doing?$k$pWere you avoiding me? Did I do
something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Oh, no, Juno! The thing is,
you see, umm...$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|You didn't do anything wrong!
There was just a lot going on,
we got caught up preparing...$k$p$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|Thea! Sh!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Preparing? For what?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ゼロット,ch02_34_Zearot_M_Wedding21,Face|I'm sure they have their reasons.
They'll tell us all about it later—
won't you, girls?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Of course.$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Right. We will.$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Let's not forget that we have yet
to win the tournament...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Hey, Juno, Zelot! Over here!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|What has you so excited, Shanna?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ゼロット,ch02_34_Zearot_M_Wedding21,Face|Isn't this the venue where winners
of the tournament get to hold their
reward ceremony?$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|We wanted to have a ceremony for
you two, which is why we wanted
to win so badly.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|A ceremony for us? But we...
Isn't this supposed to be a festival
for everyone?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|You deserve it, Juno! Plus you have
on such a beautiful dress...$k$pIt would be a waste not to create
some wonderful new memories
here with Zelot!$k$p$WmMPID_双界外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|We also invited other Heroes who
come from your world.$k$p$WmMPID_フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Normal,Face|Congratulations, Zelot and Juno!$k$p$WmMPID_バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_Normal,Face|Yes! Congrats, you two!$k$p$WmMPID_ディーク,ch02_29_Deak_M_Normal,Face|Sitting around like this is making me
itchy, but Shanna was persistent, so...
let me congratulate you.$k$p$WmMPID_クレイン,ch02_13_Klein_M_Normal,Face|Allow me to congratulate you as well.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Oh, you...you all did this just for us?$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|If the two of you would make your
way over here, we can get started.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Get...started? Then it really is an
entire ceremony?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ゼロット,ch02_34_Zearot_M_Wedding21,Face|Ah... They've worked so hard, it
would be rude of us to refuse...
Let's just enjoy this gift.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Yes. You're right... Thank you,
Thea, and you too, Shanna. And
you as well, Catria!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Now, don't start crying, Juno!$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Seeing you like this, all dressed up
and beautiful...is all the thanks I need.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|W-wait! Don't YOU start getting
emotional now too, Thea! The two
of you are going to make ME cry!$k$p$WmMPID_双界外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Pull yourselves together! We haven't
even started the ceremony yet.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ゼロット,ch02_34_Zearot_M_Wedding21,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_双界外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Even you, Zelot?! Well...set your
emotions aside for a moment, and
escort your bride already!$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ゼロット,ch02_34_Zearot_M_Wedding21,Face|Ah, right! Sorry. Shall we, Juno?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Yes, dear...$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Ahh... Here they come now...
All right...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|This is just lovely... I'm so jealous
of you, Juno.$k$pI hope I can have a ceremony like
this some day...$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Me too...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Huh? You too, Thea? I didn't
expect that!$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|What is that supposed to mean?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Haha! Oh nothing. It's just a joke!
But anyway...don't rush into anything,
all right?$k$pIf you get married too, I'll be the
last lonely sister...$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, don't be silly. Besides it's still
a long way— Oh, look!$k$pThe bouquet is about to be tossed!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Ooh! Wait for me! I want it!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ユーノ,ch02_32_Yuno_F_Wedding21,Face|Thea, Shanna... My loving sisters...
I hope you two both find a truly
steadfast love.$k$pWhen I see you in such beautiful
dresses next, I suspect I will see
someone great standing with you.$k$p$Sbs150|
